body.p: Louisville, Kentucky hardware merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza C. Pulliam Neale. Father of Mary E. Neale, Edward P. Neale, Jr. Operated hardware store, Harvey, Neale & Co., in Louisville in 1861 in partnership with Alexander A. Harvey.
